about_the_game:
My Trailer Park Life lets you live the RV dream as you navigate the daily challenges of life.
Manage your time and money Explore, and Interact with the ordinary world.

Poverty, corruption, urban survival, and life in the camper of your dreams can be tough


As the player, we wake up in a RV camper. In order to survive, it is necessary to maintain our own health by maintaining statuses such as hunger, hydration, stress, and hygiene.
  • In addition, we need money to live, so you have to earn it with doing work. In a normal day, we purchase food and supplies, but apparently we can steal them in some cases.

  • There is permadeath method for this game, and gameplay such as "if you die, start your life over". So be careful and think twice before starting a fight or crossing street.

  • If a theft or violent crime is discovered, you can be caught. The Player is left with a choice between living a straight and righteous life or living a shady life while committing crimes in order to survive.

Whether you're running your chorus, getting in trouble with the law, exploring the neighborhood, or uncovering secrets. The paths you take shapes your story. In this life simulation, discover the beauty of the ordinary while maintaining your wellbeing and weave your own story. Live the trailer park life and enjoy.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: General Mature Content

detailed_description:
My Trailer Park Life lets you live the RV dream as you navigate the daily challenges of life.
Manage your time and money Explore, and Interact with the ordinary world.

Poverty, corruption, urban survival, and life in the camper of your dreams can be tough


As the player, we wake up in a RV camper. In order to survive, it is necessary to maintain our own health by maintaining statuses such as hunger, hydration, stress, and hygiene.
  • In addition, we need money to live, so you have to earn it with doing work. In a normal day, we purchase food and supplies, but apparently we can steal them in some cases.

  • There is permadeath method for this game, and gameplay such as "if you die, start your life over". So be careful and think twice before starting a fight or crossing street.

  • If a theft or violent crime is discovered, you can be caught. The Player is left with a choice between living a straight and righteous life or living a shady life while committing crimes in order to survive.

Whether you're running your chorus, getting in trouble with the law, exploring the neighborhood, or uncovering secrets. The paths you take shapes your story. In this life simulation, discover the beauty of the ordinary while maintaining your wellbeing and weave your own story. Live the trailer park life and enjoy.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 12 Monterey or newer
  • Processor: 64-bit Intel and ARM
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: A Vulkan supported GPU
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 12 Monterey or newer
  • Processor: 64-bit Intel and ARM
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: A Vulkan supported GPU
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

name: My Trailer Park Life

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600 @ 3.3 GHz or AMD Ryzen 5 1600 @ 3.2 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 or AMD RX 560 (3GB VRAM with Vulkan Support)
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-9700 @ 3.6 GHz or AMD Ryzen 5 3600 @ 3.6 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 or AMD Radeon RX 5700 (6GB VRAM with Vulkan Support)
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: My Trailer Park Life is a single-player, permadeath, open world, urban survival, life simulator. Play the character who lives in an RV, where your choices shape the story. Manage your wellbeing, work to earn money, buy food and supplies, or steal to survive. Enjoy the beauty of the ordinary.
